TopicTitle: No orbit line or Argument of Pariapsis when inclination is zero

Articles.Content:
I have my first contract to put a satellite in orbit in this game, I've done it a bunch in other saves.  The contract is for an equatorial orbit around Kerbin, inclination of zero.  That means the ascending and descending nodes are undefined.  On the contract notes when in space, it says "Longitude of Ascending Node: Undefined" (correct) and "Argument of Periapsis: Nan degrees."  And the orbit isn't drawn on the HUD.

Is this a known issue with 1.1.2.1260 ?

My ap and pe are different (14km and 12km), and I don't know where to put them.
Sounds like you've run into the bug where the orbit lines aren't drawn when any one of the parameters is either undefined or N/A. See this other thread.
Thanks.  Is there a bug in the bug tracker for this?  If not, I suppose I could add one...

8 hours ago, martincmartin said:

Thanks.  Is there a bug in the bug tracker for this?  If not, I suppose I could add one...

Looks like there is. 

http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/9651
